Hi Joel,

Thank you very much for updating that, and so quickly.

Many thanks,

Lucy McLennanPROJECTS MANAGER, NOVARI PROJECTS

0419 445 024 | lmclennan@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside, VIC, 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Lucy,

We have updated the site payment page. The "Kerb Gardening" will not show up on the email.

action.text: Joel Maligalig changed the customer to Lucy McLennan
Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

Hi Heath,

The team at Melbourne noticed that the "kerb gardening" package appears in the quoting platform without being selected, please see below

Can you please have a look at it and get back to Lucy regarding this issue

Many Thanks

Zohrab Keledjian

Project Manager

Advantage Projects

Follow us on:

www.advantagestyling.com.au

From: Lucy McLennan <lmclennan@novaricollective.com>
Sent: Wednesday, 24 November 2021 12:10 PM
To: Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au>; Zohrab Keledjian <zohrab@advantagestyling.com.au>
Cc: Danielle Gerlach <dgerlach@novaricollective.com>; Kristy Gordon <kgordon@novaricollective.com>; Rachel Patane <rachel@dressedforsale.com.au>
Subject: FW: [Stylist] Payment Proposal - 2 Ford Avenue - ACCEPTED

Hi Dan & Zohrab,

Was just speaking to Kristy about this one - however thought you two may be able to help?!

She put through this quote on the new platform Monday.

She did not select 'Kerb Gardening'- however it has come up in the body of the email (see below) albeit at $0.00.

It is not in the attached document, that I can see at least.

Is this happening on Sydney's end? Can we remove please? Or is it there for a reason?

Let me know if you'd like me to email Heath.

Thank you 😊
